Documentation

data TypeMode #

Different representations for a Cryptol type.

Constructors

AsArg (Maybe RustLifetime)

Borrowed represewntation, used to pass arguments

AsOwned

Owned representation, currently used for locals, function results, and when the type is a field of another type

data TypeUse #

Type use XXX: A lot of these complications are because of streams and functions, which should probably be treated specially...

Constructors

TypeInFunSig

Argument or result of a functoin

TypeAsParam

Type application in a function call

TypeAsStored

Stored in another type (e.g., array/stream)

compileType :: TypeUse -> TypeMode -> Type -> Rust RustType #

Compute the Rust type used to represent the given Cryptol type.

byRef :: TypeMode -> RustType -> RustType #
